snippet: Frauds involving digital money like Bitcoin have gone unchecked. | Sears Holdings said it had filed to spin off its Lands’ End business. | Companies and regulators are growing uncomfortable with the amount of influence proxy advisory firms wield. |...
abstract: Frauds involving digital money like Bitcoin have gone unchecked. | Sears Holdings said it had filed to spin off its Lands’ End business. | Companies and regulators are growing uncomfortable with the amount of influence proxy advisory firms wield. | Twitter said it added the former publishing executive Marjorie M. Scardino to its board.
